what: Axe, IBM, WAVE, and 16 custom tests

acts.what: used for tests on which chromium fails on some URLs

items.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role

must pass any of.description: ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="false"

items.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements do not contain focusable elements
Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name

must pass any of.description: aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

items.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them

must pass any of.description: Required ARIA child role not present: tab

items.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds

must pass any of.description: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.84 (foreground color: #999999, background color: #ffffff, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.84 (foreground color: #999999, background color: #ffffff, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

items.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes

must pass all of.description: Only title used to generate label for form element

must pass any of.description: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

must pass all of.description: Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

items.description: Nested interactive controls are not announced by screen readers
Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
Flags elements whose role is none or presentation and which cause the role conflict resolution to trigger.

must pass all of.description: Element does not have global ARIA attribute

acts.what: 3 packages and 16 custom tests, with duplication discounts

rules.axe: multiply minor by 2, moderate by 3, serious by 4, critical by 5; sum; subtract discounts
rules.bulk: subtract 150 from visible elements; make 0 if negative; raise to 0.9th power; multiply by 0.15
rules.embAc: multiply link- or button-contained links, buttons, inputs, and selects by 5
rules.focAll: multiply discrepancy between focusable and focused element counts by 3
rules.focOp: multiply nonfocusable operable elements by 4, nonoperable focusable by 1; sum
rules.hover: multiply elements changing page on hover by 4, made visible by 2, with directly changed opacity by 0.1, with indirectly changed opacity by 0.2, unhoverable by 2; sum
rules.ibm: multiply violations by 4, recommendatons by 2; sum; subtract discounts
rules.labClash: multiply conflictually labeled elements by 2, unlabeled elements by 2; sum
rules.log: multiply log items by respective logWeights; sum
rules.menuNav: multiply Home and End errors by 1 and other key-navigation errors by 3; sum
rules.motion: get PNG screenshot sizes (sss); get differing-pixel counts between adjacent PNG screenshots (pd); sssd = sss difference  smaller sss; multiply mean adjacent sssd, maximum adjacent sssd, maximum over-all ssd by 15; divide mean pd, maximum pd by 25,000; multiply count of non-0 pd by 10; sum
rules.radioSet: multiply radio buttons not in fieldsets with legends and no other-name radio buttons by 2
rules.role: multiple role attributes with invalid or native-HTML-equivalent values by 2
rules.styleDiff: for each of element classes block a, inline a, button, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, and h6, get diffStyles-distinct styles; multiply their count minus 1 by 2; multiply count of elements with non-plurality styles by 0.2; sum
rules.tabNav: multiply Home and End errors by 1 and other key-navigation errors by 3; sum
rules.wave: multiply alerts by 2, contrast errors by 3, errors by 4; sum; subtract discounts
